title: Book Category Research Like a Pro for Amazon KDP with Publisher Rocket
description:
Want to make sure your book ranks on Amazon? 📚 In this video, I walk you through how to use Publisher Rocket, one of my favorite tools for self-published authors.

I’ll show you how to:
✅ Do keyword research to find exactly what readers are searching for
✅ Run category searches to know how many sales it takes to hit page one
✅ Use competitor analysis to understand your market and price your book strategically

For example, to rank #1 in the stock investing category, you’d need to sell 77 books per day — but just 14 sales could land you on page one. Knowing this up front saves you time, money, and frustration.

GET PUBLISHER ROCKET HERE  👉 https://kbrea--rocket.thrivecart.com/publisher-rocket/
 
JOIN MY SKOOL COMMUNITY HERE - https://www.skool.com/kdp-publishing/about

If you’re serious about getting your book in front of readers, this video will give you the roadmap.

#SelfPublishing #PublisherRocket #AmazonKDP #BookPublishingTips #KeywordResearch
